H0.text: Saving time is a benefit of making aluminum cans from recycled materials instead of raw materials, making it a wise choice.

H1.text: Saves trees is the reason that making aluminum cans from recycled materials instead of raw materials is a wise choice.

H2.text: Creating energy is a wise choice because making aluminum cans from recycled materials instead of raw materials creates energy.

H3.text: Reduces pollution is the reason that making aluminum cans from recycled materials instead of raw materials is a wise choice.

A4.text: Aluminium recycling limits emissions, including greenhouse gases.

A5.text: Recycling aluminium uses about 5% of the energy required to create aluminium from bauxite.

A6.text: An aluminium stack melter produces significantly less dross, with values reported below 1%.
